reviews.review: Endless hours of Zed slaughter and gorefest.. Great with friends, coop with randoms online or by yourself if you like solo play, also a massive mod community in the steam community workshop!!! 9/10 its a must own Also see KillingFloor2 another badass as F***!!! game is just a massive upgrade to this one but not so sure about the mods.

Rugged, Dark and straight forward, that's what this game is about.
No hand holding, no tutorials, just figure it out on your own and survive.

first map, it was already set in stone. This game is controlled mayhem at it's finest.

A negative is having DLC-only content show up in the Trader's screen for weapon purchases. Seems something I'd expect from a free mobile app, not a game I've paid money for.

It may be old, but it still holds up. Killing Floor is a damn fun game that keeps it entertaining. Lots of guns, gore, monsters, maps and mods. If you enjoy the blood and carnage of slaughtering ferocious monstrosities, then go ahead give this game a try. Final Verdict: 9/10

Притягательная атмосфера и графика, в духе старых стрелялок-страшилок. Не требовательная. В отличии от второй части отлично идет на моем электрическом чайнике. До сих пор живая, есть с кем поиграть. Из минусов: некоторое оружие только за донат (dlc).

Pretty good game. Big maps, decent amount of weapons. The chatbox randomly opening itself is kind of frustrating though. In the middle of a mob of clots taking care of business, then your weapon suddenly stops shooting. You try to switch guns assuming you're out of ammo but this does nothing. You start taking damage while you're now grabbed by clots so you try to heal, nothing happens. A bloat casually walks up and starts puking on you. By now you've figured out that the chatbox is open so you close it and start shooting again. Bloat blows up. You die. 10/10
just an awesome oldschool horror shooter. perfect for coop

Join your friends and fight off zombies with weapons made from various gadgets and trinkets.  Earn "dosh" and build up your arsenal to defeat the final boss.  Can you handle it?

Pros:
+ Good visceral gunplay
+ Cool weapons made from various gadgets and trinkets
+ Neat and diverse levels

Cons:
- Trinket and gadget gameplay could be deeper.  Let us add our own concoction of gadgets and trinkets to build custom goofy weapons!

Final score is a solid Yes Hand / 10
